main.name: Matheus Bitarães
main.description: I am a Systems Engineer insterested on solving problems
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.school: UFMG - Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais (Brazil)
education.description: Researching the use of machine learning (GANs) combined with evolutionary computing algorithms for generating a music composition and improvisation system called AI Hero.

education.school: UFMG - Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais (Brazil)
education.description: Final Thesis presented and achieved a grade of 95/100. It was about making a drum using sound and image processing.

10 months studying Engineering in Australia by program Science Without Borders. Learned programming languages such as python, c# e SQL. Role of Project Manager in a team with 8 students with the objective of developing a UAV (unmanned aerial vehicle) using Systems Engineering and project managing methods. At the end of the project, the UAV could perform with 90% of the objectives with success. Demonstration video available in:   https://youtu.be/mdGK8ZmwnYk.

education.school: CEFET MG - Centro Federal de Educação Tecnológica (Brazil)

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
